name: BSAW CD PACKAGE
description: Both of Blood Spilt As Water's Releases for a damn good price!

name: Upon A Shallow Grave- "there will be no solace"
description:
Upon A Shallow Grave have returned and they hit harder than ever, this album is truly a masterpiece.  For fans of any genre of heavy music for UASG incorporate it all death to core to jazz, its all here and it all clocks in at a little over 44 minutes.
1.  An introduction
2.  Goatbeard
3.  Upon A Shallow Grave
4.  There will be no solace
5.  Tom Marvolo Riddle
6.  Barlow
7.  Forseen visions in retrospect
8.  constraints
9.  Doomsday

name: Myself My Enemy- "Anamneses"
description:
New MME EP- Anamneses
5 songs, clocking in at over 20 minutes of brand new material!!!


This is a Pre-Order, orders will ship December 23rd!!!!

name: Slave to the Kill- "Mental Mass Graves"
description:
Slave to the Kill's debt, Mental Mass Graves pummels the listener's eardrums over the course of seven tracks, and never stops crushing until your just as pissed as they are. 
1.  Empire Collapsed
2.  Mental Mass Graves
3.  Blood of Man and Lamb: A Sacrifice of Expiation
4.  Crush the Weight
5.  Slave to Kill
6.  State of Corrupt and Declining Design
7.  Foreign and Familiar Dystopia
all clocking in at over 24 minutes.

name: Your Nightmare Awaits-"Nihilistic Disfigurement"
description:
Jan of 09' saw YNA in the studio with Producer/Engineer Grant McFarland (Century/This Or The Appocalypse), recording their Broken Hope Productions debut EP "NHILISTIC DISFIGUREMENT", which was unleashed to the masses on Valentines Day (2/14/09). YNA is stronger than ever. All the proof needed to back that is in its growing fan base, increasing album sales, live performances unlike anything seen before, and a raw sound that leaves you wanting nothing more then to destroy. After all of YNA's triumphs over every single hardship that's been thrown its way, there is no way of predicting what the future wil hold for these bringers of doom and death. Come to a show and experience the beast that is....
YOUR NIGHTMARE AWAITS
Tracklist:
1. Intro                               0:52
2. Career for a rich bitch     2:50
3. Juggernaut                     4:50
4. Murder noise                  3:23
5. Death slug                      3:22
6. Outro                              0:57
